MODULE.name: WebViewClientSSLAuth
MODULE.HELP_OVERVIEW: This extension will provide support for client SSL auth in WebView.

PROPERTIES.DESC: list of properties supported by module

PROPERTY.name: clientKeyPath
PROPERTY.DESC: Path to the client private key and certificate storage. PKCS12 format is required. This property mirrors rhoconfig.txt option 'clientSSLCertificate'.

PROPERTY.name: clientKeyPassword
PROPERTY.DESC: Password for the client private key storage. This property mirrors rhoconfig.txt option 'clientSSLCertificatePassword'.
